author: Sabine Hossenfelder
description:
Learn faster and retain more with Recall. Use my code "Sabine25" and go to https://www.getrecall.ai/?t=sabine for 25% off a Recall subscription that is valid until January 1, 2026.

A group of scientists claim that the origin of life for complex organisms on Earth might have occurred not once, but twice. This challenges our current understanding of early evolution and the biological history of our planet. However, their findings have been rather controversial. Let's have a look at the evidence. 

Paper 1 here: https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-025-59760-9
Paper 2 here: https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-025-04512-4

title: New Fossils Suggest That Life On Earth Started Twice
